title: UNFAIR match ups in team ranked games
body: I have a ranked team  we are in bronze 5 and we constantly get matched up against teams that have majority gold or higher players and this makes it impossible for us to stand a chance at winning. Riot you seriously need to do something about these unfair match ups!

replies.body: Agreed there need to be a system in place for ranked teams so there are fair match ups

Agree, ranked has nothing to do with fairness. It is the same when you get team mates who engage 1 vs 4 or 5 without understanding that it is not working. Ranked has to do with luck. And it is what I am experiencing... I will uninstal soon if it stays like that.
something really does need to be done about this as their is already the system to not allow bronze to que with golds or higher in solo que.
Yes, very  very unfair. Needs something to be done about it!! How can our ranked team win if we are getting queued with people in much higher ranks? i do not understand.
